review: I replaced my anterior teeth and I am very happy with the new looks, I also got my root canal done for almost other 10 teeth , doc did it very nicely , totally painless , so I am very happy,I highly recommend Dr Swapnil for all dental treatments,clinic is very clean ; hygienic,doc is friendly too , best treatment,worth money.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Mine is a unique case, I fell down on face resulted broken front teeth to the maximum extent (hardly can see left over teeth). I had approached other doctors, they had recommended to go for teeth implantation. I had approached Dr. Swapnil Shah for 2nd / 3rd opinion, he gave me very handsome option without going for implantation. Dr. Swapnil Shah is rich experienced, he explained me the procedure very clearly and he conducted root canal treatment and other procedures very carefully (given the unique case). Really gladful for his expert  suggestion and execution. I strongly recommend Dr. Swapnil Shah for all your dental issues, he look at the things in a different way and provide optimum solutions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr Swapnil is a very good and highly experienced dentist. We are very happy and convinced with his treatment and the denture he carved out for my mom. My mom has been having tooth problems since years but no perfect denture. But after consulting Dr Swapnil, she could get one near perfect denture. Dr has been supportive in making the denture fit to the mouth and with a couple of visits he made sure my mom can freely use the new denture. Also his way of tooth extraction is smooth and you can hardly realise the extraction. Highly recommended doctor. Thanks to doctor Swapnil.

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
For someone like me who is having fear of closed spaces and always been highly anxious, Dr. Swapnil Shah and Dr. Jayna Shah were like blessings in disguise. They both made me feel at ease, explained the entire procedure and Dr. Swapnil's expertise in Dentistry has resolved my issues and also my fears about dental treatment. Not to forget the hygienic approach they have taken during this pandemic also helped to put away all my anxiety. I highly recommend them for any kind of Dental Treatment. 
Thank you both of you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
** ******* **** ** ******* *** ** *** **** ******** * **** *** **** ***** ** ** ********* ************* *** took time to explain the issue to me in detail. I had a really stinging pain the back of my mouth and I was unable to understand if it was coming from my jaw bone or was it a tooth issue. Dr Shah took a look at it and took an X-ray and explained that it was the wisdom tooth that was giving me the pain. He told that an extraction would be the best course of action and I had it removed today a few hours back. I'd highly recommend him.

Anoop
IIT Bombay

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Doctor was very helpful. He was ready to schedule everything according to our convenience. Most important waiting time was not too much. They explained very nicely. They just told what is the problem and it's solution. They did not try to 'convince' for the extraction. Even the surgeon was very nice.
